title: What’s News: World-Wide
body:
Derek Chauvin was convicted on all counts in the killing of George Floyd, a Black man whose death in May in police custody was captured on video that went viral and set off a summer of unrest over law enforcement’s treatment of people of color.
Europe’s health agency said a warning about unusual blood clots should be added to the product information of the J&J Covid-19 vaccine, but that the benefits of taking the shot outweigh the risks.
Russia has moved warplanes to Crimea and bases near Ukraine to an extent greater than previously disclosed, according to commercial-satellite photos.
Biden told a group of lawmakers that he intends to propose only a temporary extension of an enhanced child tax credit.
Soaring carbon emissions are on track to reverse a big chunk of last year’s sharp reduction, which some climate researchers saw as a possible upside to the pandemic.
